title: SurfFWHM
description: A program for calculating local and global FWHM.

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Dataset for which the FWHM is to be calculated.

mask.title: Node mask
mask.description: Node mask so that only nodes in the mask are used to obtain estimates.

surf_1.title: Surface 1
surf_1.description: Option for specifying the surface over which the input dataset is defined.

surf_sphere.title: Surface Sphere
surf_sphere.description: Spherical version of -SURF_1 for Local FWHM estimates.

clean.title: Clean output
clean.description: Strip text from output to simplify parsing.

detrend.title: Detrend
detrend.description: Detrend to order 'q'. If q is not given, the program picks q=NT/30.

detpoly.title: Detrend polynomial
detpoly.description: Detrend with polynomials of order p.

detprefix.title: Detrend prefix
detprefix.description: Save the detrended file into a dataset with prefix 'd'.

vox_size.title: Voxel size
vox_size.description: Specify the nominal voxel size in mm.

neighborhood.title: Neighborhood radius
neighborhood.description: Neighborhood radius R for local FWHM estimates.

ok_warn.title: OK Warn
ok_warn.description: Flag to set the mode to ok_warn.

examples.title: Examples
examples.description: Show command line examples and quit.

slice.title: Slice
slice.description: Use the contours from planar intersections to estimate gradients. For testing and development purposes only.
